SEARCH
程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.block.data

接口 ArtisanBlockData

@NonExtendable public interface ArtisanBlockData
Data container representing an actual custom block instance in the world.

This interface encapsulates all runtime state of a placed custom block, including:

  • Physical location and display state
  • Associated GUI instance (if any)
  • Block lifecycle event manager
  • Custom persistent data storage (if any)
  • Current block state index

另请参阅:
  • custom block type definition
  • block state system

  • 方法详细资料

    • builder

      @NotNull static @NotNull ArtisanBlockData.Builder builder()
      Creates a new block data builder instance
      返回:
      a block data builder instance for creating custom block data

    • getGUI

      @Nullable @Nullable ArtisanBlockGUI getGUI()
      Gets the GUI associated with this block
      返回:
      GUI instance, or null if the block doesn't support it

    • getLocation

      @NotNull @NotNull Location getLocation()
      Gets the physical location of the block in the world
      返回:
      an immutable location object containing world and coordinate information

    • blockId

      @NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey blockId()
      Gets the block's ID
      返回:
      a namespaced key consistent with ArtisanBaseBlock.getBlockId()
      另请参阅:
      • ArtisanBaseBlock.getBlockId()

    • stage

      int stage()
      Gets the current block state index
      返回:
      an integer between 0 and ArtisanBaseBlock.getTotalStates() (exclusive of the upper bound)

    • getArtisanBlock

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanBaseBlock getArtisanBlock()
      Gets the associated custom block definition
      返回:
      an immutable block type instance

    • getArtisanBlockState

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanBaseBlockState getArtisanBlockState()
      Gets the current block state instance
      返回:
      an immutable state obtained through ArtisanBaseBlock.getState(int)

    • getPersistentDataContainer

      @NotNull @NotNull PersistentDataContainer getPersistentDataContainer()
      Gets the persistent data container for the block

      Used to store additional custom data

      返回:
      a readable and writable Bukkit API data container with the same lifecycle as the block instance
      抛出:
      IllegalStateException - if the custom block doesn't have a block entity

    • getLifecycleTaskManager

      @NotNull @NotNull LifecycleTaskManager getLifecycleTaskManager()
      Gets the lifecycle task manager for the block
      返回:
      the lifecycle task manager instance for this block
